description: This file defines a Flutter widget called LeaderboardScreen that displays a leaderboard list using mock data. It imports Flutter material package, a leaderboard entry model, and a custom background widget. The widget constructs a scaffold with an app bar and a list of leaderboard entries styled with theme colors.

classes.name: LeaderboardScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the leaderboard screen, displaying a list of mock leaderboard entries with styling and background.

methods.name: _mockData
methods.description: Returns a list of sample leaderboard entries with predefined player data.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the leaderboard screen, including app bar, background, and a list of leaderboard cards.
